title: Northwestern will gather more information on football hazing allegations amid Fitzgerald suspension
description: Hazing allegations led to the suspension of Northwestern coach Pat Fitzgerald.

title: 1 man arrested, 1 sought in connection with Kansas nightclub shooting
description: A 19-year-old man is in custody in connection with a mass shooting a week ago inside a Kansas nightclub, and police have identified a second man being sought

title: New museum in Alabama tells history of last known slave ship to US and its survivors
description: A new museum Alabama tells the history of the Clotilda — the last ship known to transport Africans to the American South for enslavement

title: WATCH:  Baby seal learns how to surf in San Diego
description: A baby seal named Sammy was observed jumping on people's surfboards at San Diego's Tourmaline Surf Park. Now, the seal is catching waves with a little help.

title: Judge dismisses lawsuit seeking reparations for the 1921 Tulsa Race Massacre
description: An Oklahoma judge threw out a suit seeking reparations for the 1921 massacre,

title: 1 dead, 15 injured after SUV traveling wrong way collides with Chicago bus
description: Authorities say an SUV traveling the wrong way along a Chicago lakefront road has collided with a city bus, killing one of the SUV’s passengers and injuring 15 other people

title: FDA asked to look into Logan Paul's energy drink
description: An influencer-backed energy drink that has earned viral popularity among children is facing scrutiny from lawmakers and health experts over its potentially dangerous levels of caffeine

title: Zelenskyy on how Russian invasion may end, gratitude for US aid and Putin's weakness
description: Zelenskyy, adviser Andriy Yermak and some of Ukraine's most senior generals spoke with Martha Raddatz to address pressing questions in Russia's invasion

title: Los Angeles police arrest suspect in apparent random shootings at 3 locations
description: Police in Los Angeles have arrested a suspect following what appears to be a series of random shootings that wounded one victim

title: US drones 'harassed' by Russian jets later kill Islamic State leader: Officials
description: The U.S. military said Saturday that U.S. drones "harassed" by Russian jets on Friday later carried out airstrike on a top ISIS leader

title: UN chief says Sudan on the brink of a 'full-scale civil war' after nearly 3 months of fighting
description: U.N. Secretary-General Antonio Guterres says Sudan is on the brink of a “full-scale civil war,” as fierce clashes between rival generals continued unabated Sunday in the capital, Khartoum

title: Luis Suárez, only Spanish man to win Ballon d’Or, has died
description: Luis Suárez Miramontes, the so-called “Golden Galician” who is the only Spanish man to win soccer’s most prestigious individual award, the Ballon d’Or, has died, according to former club Inter Milan

title: 9 injured in Ohio shooting early Sunday morning, police say
description: Nine people have been hospitalized after a suspect opened fire on a group of people in Cleveland, police said.

title: 9 missing in China landslide sparked by heavy rains amid flooding and searing temperatures
description: Chinese authorities say nine people are missing in a landslide sparked by heavy rains amid flooding and searing temperatures across much of the country

title: Powerball jackpot rises to $650 million
description: The Powerball jackpot has now risen to $650 million, with a $328.2 million cash option after no one won Saturday's drawing.

title: Bob Huggins says he never resigned as West Virginia's coach and wants his job back, attorney claims
description: Bob Huggins says he never resigned as West Virginia’s basketball coach following a drunken-driving arrest and wants his job back

title: WATCH:  Mama bear no match for locked trash can
description: A determined mother bear was unable to open a locked trash can despite many attempts to get inside it and retrieve food for her cubs.

title: 1 dead, 3 injured after gunman fired from scooter in apparent random shooting spree
description: The incidents occurred on the streets of Brooklyn and Queens in a nearly 30-minute span on Saturday morning, according to NYPD Det. Joseph Kenny.

title: Fire aboard cargo ship docked in New Jersey has been contained
description: A fire aboard a cargo ship docked in Newark, New Jersey, has been contained, officials said on Saturday.
